さっぱり分らない: (さっぱりわからない) - having no inkling of; having no idea of
さてこそ: (さてこそ) - just as I thought/as expected; that's why
さては: (さては) - and then/besides/on top of that; in that case/that being the case/if so
さて置き: (さておき) - setting aside; leaving to one side
さとうきび糖: (さとうきびとう) - cane sugar; sugar cane juice; sugar cane molasses
さばさば: (sabasaba) - aliviado, revigorado; despreocupado, relaxado, franco, sincero
さばに: (さばに) - (from Ryuku lang.) plank-built fishing boat (Okinawa)
さばを読む: (さばをよむ) - to manipulate figures to one's advantage; to count wrongly on purpose; to inflate or deflate one's age
さび: (さび) - hook (high point of a song); (さび only)   (at a sushi shop) wasabi
さび抜き: (さびぬき) - sushi without wasabi; wasabi-free sushi
さぶる少女: (さぶるおとめ) - prostitute and entertainer
さまざまな理由から: (さまざまなりゆうから) - for various reasons
さまよえるユダヤ人: (さまよえるユダヤじん) - Wandering Jew
さみだれ式: (さみだれしき) - (yoji) (often 五月雨式に)  off and on manner; intermittent style; dragging on and on
さもしい: (さもしい) - selfish; self-seeking; self-interested; mean
さやさや: (sayasaya) - soft, light rustling (ex. folhas ao vento)
さようならホームラン: (さようならホームラン) - {baseb} game-ending home run
さよならホームラン: (さようならホームラン) - {baseb} game-ending home run
さらさら: (sarasara) - sussurrante, murmurante; fluentemente; sedoso, macio e seco, de fluxo livre
さらし者: (さらしもの) - pilloried criminal exposed to public view; public scorn or humiliation; person shamed in front of others
さらし裏: (さらしうら) - bleached lining (esp. tabi); bleached interior
さらし首: (さらしくび) - criminal's head on public display; displaying a beheaded head; beheaded head
さらに悪いことに: (さらにわるいことに) - and what is worse; to make matters worse
さらぴん: (サラピン) - unused item; new thing
さらり: (さらり) - sleek/smooth; thin (of a liquid); without hesitation or delay
さり乍ら: (さりながら) - nevertheless; still; however; yet
さり気: (さりげ) - (n,adj-nari)   like that; in that manner
さり気ない: (さりげない) - nonchalant; unconcerned; in a casual manner
さる事: (さること) - something like that/that sort of thing; something natural/something plausible
さる事ながら: (さることながら) - It goes without saying; but not only that; but also ...
さる年: (さるどし) - year of the monkey
さる者: (さるもの) - formidable person/shrewd person/someone not to be taken lightly/person of no common order; certain person (e.g. whose name cannot be disclosed)/someone; that sort of person/that kind of person
さん: (さん) - (after a person's name (or position, etc.))  Mr./Mrs./Miss/Ms./-san; (usu. after a noun or na-adjective prefixed with お- or ご-)  makes words more polite (usu. in fixed expressions)
さんざめく: (ざざめく) - to be boisterously noisy
さんしょうの皮: (さんしょうのかわ) - pieces of young pepper tree branch (used medicinally or for pickling)
さんや袋: (さんやぶくろ) - pilgrim's carry-all bag
さん付け: (さんづけ) - attaching 'san' to somebody's name
さーたーあんだぎー: (サータアンダーギー) - sata andagi; Okinawan sweet deep-fried bun similar to a doughnut
さ来週: (さらいしゅう) - week after next
さ迷う: (さまよう) - to loiter; to putter; to prowl; to wander about; to roam about; to knock around
さ迷えるユダヤ人: (さまよえるユダヤじん) - Wandering Jew
ざ: (ざ) - (after the -nai stem of a verb, usu. accompanied by まい, esp. as 〜ざあなるまい)  if it is not ...; if it does not ...
ざあ: (ざ) - (after the -nai stem of a verb, usu. accompanied by まい, esp. as 〜ざあなるまい)  if it is not ...; if it does not ...
ざあざあ: (ざあざあ) - sound of rushing water; sound of pouring rain; white noise sound
ざくざく: (ざくざく) - lots of coins or jewels; cutting up roughly; walking on frost; mixing gravel
ざくろ鼻: (ざくろばな) - rhinophyma; red swollen nose (often associated with alcoholism)
ざく切り: (ざくぎり) - cutting into chunks (esp. vegetables)
ざけんじゃねーよ: (ざけんじゃねーよ) - fuck you!; don't fuck with me!; don't fuck around!; don't be a screw off!
ざけんなよ: (ざけんじゃねーよ) - fuck you!; don't fuck with me!; don't fuck around!; don't be a screw off!
ざざめく: (ざざめく) - to be boisterously noisy
ざざ虫: (ざざむし) - (in Shinshu) dobsonfly or stonefly larva
ざっくざっく: (ざっくざっく) - crunch crunch; thud thud; tramp tramp
ざっくり: (ざっくり) - roughly/approximately/loosely; cutting or breaking apart with vigour; deeply (cut or split); rough (woollens, etc., as adjectival phrase with (to)shita); sound of treading on pebbles
ざぶりざぶり: (ざぶりざぶり) - sound of living, moving water
ざまを見ろ: (ざまをみろ) - serves you right!; see what happens!
ざら: (ざら) - common/commonplace; reckless; pulp paper; granulated sugar; coins/small change
ざらざら: (ざらざら) - rough (touch, voice, etc.)/coarse/gritty/granular; sound of grains or beads moving
ざらつく: (ザラつく) - to be rough feeling
ざらにある: (ザラにある) - common (of objects, abstract things); usual
ざら場: (ざらば) - continuous session (e.g. trading in a stock exchange); zaraba
ざら紙: (ざらがみ) - pulp paper; rough (printing) paper
ざり: (ざり) - (from 〜ずあり) (used after a -nai stem) not ...; (from 〜ぞあり; usu. as 〜にざりける) is/are
ざる: (ざる) - (literary form of -ない)  not; un-
ざるべからず: (ざるべからず) - (attaches to the imperfective form; from ざり + べし)  must (do, be)
ざるを得ない: (ざるをえない) - cannot help (doing); have no choice but to; am compelled to; am obliged to; it is incumbent upon (me) to
